version_description:
- Your 2nd request on any photo project is now only $3.99 (a 55% discount)
- Easier to use and improved re-edit feature - your 1st re-edit is free (included)

We always strive to bring you the best user experience, new features and improvements.
Please rate the app and let us know what you think!

- First Custom Design is only $1.99
- 3 New Design Levels: Design, Custom and Pro

- Pro Design includes Faster Turnaround and Tap & Tell flexibility to specify exactly what you want on your photo
- Improved Tell a Friend and Re-Edit functions

Did you like the work that the designer did? Now you can select them in your next order
We heard you, so we added a real time chat service to help you as you are placing your order
And even we added an easier way to tell your designer how to make your perfect photo!

And even we added an easier way to tell your designer how to make your perfect photo!

New Photo Bundles and Promotional Offers!
- Get 25% off when you get a Bundle of 4 photos.
- Baby, Toddler, Kids, Family and Self Bundles.
- Create a set of 4 photos of your loved ones using the new Bundles.
- New Offers page showcases all the opportunities to save on Krome.

New Photo Bundles and Promotional Offers!
- Get 25% off when you get a Bundle of 4 photos.
- Baby, Toddler, Kids, Family and Self Bundles.
- Create a set of 4 photos of your loved ones using the new Bundles.
- New Offers page showcases all the opportunities to save on Krome.

This version includes Artificial Intelligence (AI) powered photo editing tool, it will allow you to separate the people in your photo from their background and place them on a new background, you can resize, move and rotate the people or the background to make the perfect photo

You asked for it, so we have added the $3 Correct option for improving color, skin and background clean up of your photos.
We've added AI powered preview to the very popular Design option.
User Interface is now even easier and faster than before.
You can access Tool functionality via the Krome Preview app under the settings menu.

OS 11 support for all new phones. Improvements to the Subscription Service option.

OS 11 support for all new phones. Improvements to the Subscription Service option.

We updated our popular PRO option (now CUSTOM) to include the AI powered preview so it is now easier to get your creative photo designs.
Simpler first time customer experience using the popular DESIGN option.

We updated our popular PRO option (now CUSTOM) to include the AI powered preview so it is now easier to get your creative photo designs.
Simpler first time customer experience using the popular DESIGN option.

By popular demand, we now have 3 subscriptions options:  Enthusiast, Creative and Artist.  They give you expanded savings starting at only $10 per month, you can Krome your own and family photos while sharing your creativity every week.

By popular demand, we now have 3 subscriptions options:  Enthusiast, Creative and Artist.  They give you expanded savings starting at only $10 per month, you can Krome your own and family photos while sharing your creativity every week.

We've added custom request option to our popular Design order. And you can now sign your creative images by Krome.
You can turn on or off your signature on the download step. You can set the text for your signature, it defaults to your first name and last name initial. There is a very subtle krome watermark, which you can also turn on or off (keep it on to show off your creative and beautiful photo images).

We've added custom request option to our popular Design order. And you can now sign your creative images by Krome.
You can turn on or off your signature on the download step. You can set the text for your signature, it defaults to your first name and last name initial. There is a very subtle krome watermark, which you can also turn on or off (keep it on to show off your creative and beautiful photo images).
We've added the ability to preview product images along with your selected background. We've also added an estimate for your re-edits.
We've added the ability to preview product images along with your selected background. We've also added an estimate for your re-edits.

Major update: We've added Lookbook recommendations and Search. Plus an improved preview of your photo on top of the background.
The recommendation uses our AI system to find the best Lookbook by looking at your photo and comparing it to the 500K photos we've edited in the last few months.
The search allows you to type as little as 3 letters to describe which Lookbook design you want.
The new preview image is in the center and you can 'dock' it by tapping or swiping it, so you can better see the lookbook design under it.

Major update: We've added Lookbook recommendations and Search. Plus an improved preview of your photo on top of the background.
The recommendation uses our AI system to find the best Lookbook by looking at your photo and comparing it to the 500K photos we've edited in the last few months.
The search allows you to type as little as 3 letters to describe which Lookbook design you want.
The new preview image is in the center and you can 'dock' it by tapping or swiping it, so you can better see the lookbook design under it.

We've now added a Free Trial option for first time customers. Submit your first order for free and you'll see your Krome image with a watermark. You'll love it!  Unlock it for less than $5.
